verse: Here are the Levites David put in charge of the music in the house of the Lord. He did it after the ark was placed there.

The men used their music to serve in front of the holy tent, the tent of meeting. They served there until Solomon built the temple of the Lord in Jerusalem. They did their work according to the rules they had been given.
Here are the men who served. The list also includes their sons.
The rest of the Levites were appointed to do all the other work at the holy tent. It was the house of God.

Aaron and his sons after him brought the offerings. They sacrificed them on the altar of burnt offering. They also burned incense on the altar of incense. That was part of what they did in the Most Holy Room. Thatâ€™s how they paid for the sin of Israel. They did everything just as Moses, the servant of God, had commanded.
So the Israelites gave the Levites all these towns and their grasslands.
